name: Global uniques
uniques: [-100]% growth [in all cities] <when below [-18] Happiness>
[-4 Production, -1 Culture] [in all cities] <when below [-16] Happiness>
[-20]% Strength <for [Военный] units> <when below [-15] Happiness>
[-20]% [Gold] from Trade Routes <when below [-12] Happiness>
[-2 Production, -1 Culture] [in all cities] <when below [-8] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-7] Happiness>
[-1 Culture] [in all cities] <when below [-6] Happiness>
[-2 Gold] [in all cities] <when below [-4] Happiness>
[-50]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-18] and [-3] Happiness>
Cannot build [Колонизатор] units <when below [-1] Happiness>
[+5]% Strength <for [Военный] units> <when between [5] and [8] Happiness>
[+1 Gold] per [2] population [in all cities] <when between [5] and [8] Happiness>

[+2 Gold] per [2] population [in all cities] <when between [9] and [10] Happiness>

[+10]% Strength <for [Военный] units> <when between [11] and [15] Happiness>

[+2 Production] from every specialist [in all cities] <when between [11] and [15] Happiness>
[+15]% Strength <for [Военный] units> <when between [16] and [100] Happiness>
[+2 Gold, +1 Culture] per [2] population [in all cities] <when between [16] and [100] Happiness>
[+2 Production, +1 Gold] from every specialist [in all cities] <when between [16] and [100] Happiness>

[+3 Gold, +2 Culture] per [2] population [in all cities] <when between [100] and [999] Happiness>
[+3 Production, +2 Gold] from every specialist [in all cities] <when between [100] and [999] Happiness>
